content.p: Director Knowledge Exchange Asia;, Financial & Business Services Jason Feehily is the UK Director of the Nottingham Model Confucius Institute at the University of Nottingham. Jason is also Director of Knowledge Exchange Asia which seeks to enhance research, policy and commercial collaborations in Asia for the University. Jason spends part of his role at the award winning University of Nottingham Ningbo China Campus with a focus on research; entrepreneurship; CPD; and philanthropic engagement. Jason holds a first degree in Theology and Philosophy from New College Oxford University and Masters in both Training and Business Administration from Leicester University. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
